pkgmetadata.longdescription: The OANDA v20 REST API provides programmatic access to OANDA's next generationv20 trading engine.Installation############Install using pip::pip install v20If you don't wish to use pip::git clone https://github.com/oanda/v20-python.gitDocumentation#############For documentation, usage and examples, see: http://developer.oanda.com/rest-live-v20/introductionand https://github.com/oanda/v20-python-samples
